title: (x) thin Art Deco display sans - Bernhard Fashion {Marten F}
author: canape

comments.content: It's probably [Bitstream's version](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bernhard-fashion/). That's a little bit thinner than the others...

Is that cap S upsidedown or meant that way?

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
The S does look a bit top-heavy in the Bitstream version
That is, indeed, Lucian Bernhard's original 1929 'S'.
